Title: Relates to regulations governing the sale and distribution of medical marihuana; repealer
Summary: Relates to regulations governing the sale and distribution of medical marihuana; permits registered organizations to contract with other entities to provide facilities, equipment and services; repeals provisions relating to pricing.
LawCode: Amd ยง3364, rpld ยง3369-d, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to normalizing the organization of registered organizations to produce, sell, deliver or distribute medical marihuana under strong regulation; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating to pricing of medical marihuana
